Identified key competitors for each site, recommended optimal daily 
pricing based on corresponding competitors for a site and developed a 
dynamic pricing model
Pricing Analysis
(Retail Gas Station Stores)

PRICING ANALYSIS FOR A PE-OWNED GAS STATION CHAIN
â–ªAnalyzed daily price and volume data for each site and all the competitors within 5-mile radius of that site
â–ªIdentified key competitors for each site based on the correlation between the companyâ€™s price premiums (compared to each competitor) and their sales 
volumes
â–ªDetermined the optimal price premium with respect to a particular competitor, and the resulting daily price, in order to maximize the gross profit at site level
â–ªAutomated the model to update recommended prices based on latest competitor prices and list of key competitors (based on defined thresholds for price 
premium vs. volume correlations)
VALUE ADDITION
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Company is a PE-owned chain of gas stations in U.S. and Canada
SITUATION
â–ªClient had an opportunity to maximize the gross profit earned from sales of gas through identification of optimal pricing premium in comparison to its 
competitors 
â–ªMerilytics partnered with the client to identify key competitors for each site, recommended optimal daily pricing based on corresponding competitors for a 
site and developed a dynamic pricing model
IMPACT
â–ªIdentified the key competitors at site level which helped the Management drive their pricing and locations strategy
â–ªDetermined the optimal daily price in order to maximize the gross profit at a site level
â–ªDeveloped a dynamic model allowed for continued use of the analysis based on latest data and new inputs
2
